reviewtext: This springboard module is great.  I would highly recommend to users of the Handspring visor line, as it would give some protection to data loss while away from your computer.Picture this, you are away travelling on a business trip, and your Visor just so happened to have a total drain in battery power and you did not know it until you needed to use it.Go into you bag or briefcase, and restore the information back into your Visor, a very quick process!
